SetBonus.4: When the equipper is a Stun character and uses an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, increases CRIT DMG of all squad members by 15%, and when the equipper's CRIT Rate is more than or equal to 50%, further increases CRIT DMG by 15%, lasting 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.
